title: Lobby
introMessage:
🏆 Welcome to the PokéAgent Challenge! 🏆

🤖 NeurIPS 2025 AI Competition Server 🤖
Train your AI agents to become Pokémon masters!

🔗 Website | Discord
Rules:
  • Humans can play too!
  • Bots should play under usernames that start with "PAC" (PokéAgent Challenge)
    • "PAC-MM-X" are organizer-hosted metamon models (with extra team variety)
    • "PAC-BH-X" are organizer-hosted heuristic agents
    • "PAC-PC-X" are organizer-hosted pokechamp agents
Notes:
  • News/Announcements on this page are tied to the main Showdown server and are not related to the PokéAgent Challenge
